<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/payments/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Fetches detailed information on a specific payment by  `id `.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"id","in":"path","description":"ID of the `Payment`.","required":true,"style":"simple","explode":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
